A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Very disappointing\, I can't believe what Disney did to Luke... even when the Force Awakens was a copy from the first Star Wars: A New Hope\, it was more appealing and it rose many questions that this movie did not care to answer\, it seems that the Disney formula of having dumb jokes and some colorful scenes did not work this time\, they ruined what it could be a great continuation of a story.
